member.name: T:Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLogger
member.summary: Sends log messages to Application Insights.
member.author: Mihail Smacinih

member.name: M:Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLogger.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Common.Logging.LogLevel,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true [show date time].
if set to true [show log name].

member.name: M:Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLogger.WriteInternal(Common.Logging.LogLevel,System.Object,System.Exception)
member.summary: Actually sends the message to the underlying log system.
member.param: the level of this log event.
the exception to log (may be null)

member.name: T:Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLoggerFactoryAdapter
member.summary: Concrete subclass of ILoggerFactoryAdapter specific to ApplicationInsights.
member.remarks:
The following configuration property values must be configured:
InstrumentationKey: Application Insights InstrumentationKey
member.example:
The following snippet shows how to configure ApplicationInsights logging for Common.Logging:
<configuration> <configSections> <section name="logging" type="Common.Logging.ConfigurationSectionHandler, Common.Logging" /> </configSections> <common> <logging> <factoryAdapter type="Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLoggerFactoryAdapter, Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights"> <arg key="InstrumentationKey" value="[InstrumentationKey]" /> </factoryAdapter> </logging> </common> </configuration>
member.author: Mihail Smacinih

member.name: M:Common.Logging.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsLoggerFactoryAdapter.#ctor(Common.Logging.Configuration.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: Looks for level, showDateTime, showLogName, dateTimeFormat items from for use when the GetLogger methods are called. for more information on how to use the standard .NET application configuraiton file (App.config/Web.config) to configure this adapter.
member.param: The name value collection, typically specified by the user in a configuration section named common/logging.
